name: Role Of The Dicer
description:
First game I've ever made, first game jam I've ever entered, first time I've been on itch.io so pardon me if its bad.

In this game you star as a chef trying to dice their ingredients as they roll back and forth thanks to the constant rocking of the boat.

Controls:

Escape/Esc = Return to main menu

Left Click = Lower/hold knife lower

Right Click = Show recipe

Point your mouse to move the knife.

Make sure you finish in time or the passengers will get angry at you!

More updates coming soon probably (maybe).
